cab.content: CONFIDENTIAL LIBRAR"(THIS DOCUMENT IS THE PROPERTY OF HIS BRITANNIC MAJESTY'S GOVEENMENT)SECRET, CP, 55 (26) ,Copy No-.CABINET.194PUBLIC TOPKS.....LOAN BILL, 1926.Memorandum by -the Finanoial , Secretary.This is an annual Bill required to fix the maximum aurn which the Public Works Loan Board may lend from the Local Loans Fund until a further annual Bill is passed, Last year's Act authorised the issue nf 25 millions, but owing to the great activity of local authorities in connection with housing, this authority will be exhausted by the - end of April instead of lasting as was expected till August. It is, therefore, necessary to introduce and pass a neu Bill at once.2, The amount proposed for the new Bill is 35 millions, 10 millions more than the sums taken in the last few years the increase being due, as stated above, to the increasing needs for housing,o. I understand that the Government Whips desire the Bill to be introduced immediately after the Address, and arrangements are being made accordingly.(Intd) R .McN.TREASURY CHAMBERS.
